node.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine
node.description: Cosplay Mania 2022 has announced that it is also set to host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine. The two VTubers will participate in the event's Japanese Anime Music (JAM) Concert.

node.title: Philippine VTubers Collaborate for a Huge Merch Drop
node.description: Virtual YouTubers in the Philippines are gaining interest, with some of them having their own set of communities. One of the most popular local VTubers, Kaheru Orange, has a Discord audience of more than 6,000; Live2D model artist Pan the VTuber has around 5,000. This is aside from a huge number of fans following mainstream VTubers from the English branches of Hololive and Nijisanji.
